attributes.action: SCRAP THE BBC TELEVISION LICENCE FEE WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT
attributes.additional_details: THE BBC IS NOW AN OUT OF TOUCH TV STATION AND THE PEOPLE OF BRITAIN SHOULD NO LONGER HAVE TO PAY FOR SOMETHING THEY NEITHER WANT OR NEED, MAKE THE BBC A FREE OR PAY AS YOU VIEW CHANNEL SO PEOPLE HAVE A CHOICE.
attributes.background: THE BBC SHOULD COME INTO LINE WITH EVERY OTHER TV CHANNEL IN BRITAIN AND BE FREE OR PAY PER VIEW, THE CURRENT LICENCE FEE SHOULD BE ABOLISHED IMMEDIATELY

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300118
